info.title: Navigate backwards to a menu button

references.linkText: APG Example: Actions Menu Button  Using

raw.name: JAWS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

setupScript.scriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the menu button
setupScript.name: setFocusAfterMenuButton
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the menu button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link,, navigate to the menu button.

virtualCursor: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.
pcCursor: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the menu button, 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the menu button, 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links'

assertions.assertionStatement: Screen reader switched from reading mode to interaction mode
assertions.assertionPhrase: switch from reading mode to interaction mode

tokenizedAssertionStatements.jaws: JAWS switched from virtual cursor active to PC cursor active
tokenizedAssertionStatements.nvda: NVDA switched from browse mode to focus mode

tokenizedAssertionPhrases.jaws: switch from virtual cursor active to PC cursor active
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.nvda: switch from browse mode to focus mode
